author: James McLeod
title: Ottawa to provide $250 million to prop up strategic innovative firms hurt by COVID-19
description: Program could help as many as 1,000 startup tech companies and 10,000 jobs
content:
The Canadian tech sector is expressing cautious optimism about a federal government announcement of $250 million in new funding to prop up innovative, strategically important startups during the COVID-19 crisis.
For weeks, high-growth startups have been sayi… [+2977 chars]
